website_summaries.verdict: Play music from multiple formats including Android support from your smartphone with this big screen car stereo that simplifies the process.
pros: 24-bit control panel with resistive touch control
Displays track info from smartphone or streaming service
cons: Some users find features and service lagging after a short period of time

customer_reviews.title: All you need!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't have a DVD player, but seriously, who uses those any more? Otherwise it has the same features as the AVH-200EX, so if you use digital music these days, forget the complexity of a DVD/CD headunit and buy this one instead for less money! Works great with my phone. I'm now taking my calls handsfree, playing my music from the phone without a cord over Bluetooth, playing music from USB, and enjoying my backup camera. I replaced the stock speakers in my FJ Cruiser at the same time, and wow, what a difference! Life is good. Thanks, Pioneer!
customer_reviews.author: MtLagunaNed

customer_reviews.title: Just one big hangup
customer_reviews.text: Overall functionality and easy use should warrant 5 stars, but my biggest problem is that my radio constantly (probably every 3-4 times I drive) gets an Error-10 message. This has to do with bluetooth, which is the feature I use the most, and when it happens it literally cuts the audio and won't let you play any type of bluetooth. It completely quits out. It's fixable, but you have to turn the whole car off then back on, which is inconvenient while driving, for obvious reasons. Not sure if my radio is just a dud and this problem doesn't happen to most, but it's been pretty irritating thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Knight

customer_reviews.title: Good at first
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kids car easy to put in. Worked for about 2 months camera stoped working. Got new camera and ran new line still didn’t work so I think it has to be the radio. He can live with out that next the radio keeps going black and you have to keep resetting it . Now the radio quit picking up FM stations. I hate to leave a bad review but I don’t see where to contact seller directly. Then don't have any customer support after 60 days.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: ... of audios things that u can change and I like it alot but the thing that bothers me alot ...
customer_reviews.text: The stereo has alot of audios things that u can change and I like it alot but the thing that bothers me alot it takes like about 20secs to just connect my phone everytime i turn on the truck but overall it's a nice stereo
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit. Didn't want to hook up the parking ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit. Didn't want to hook up the parking brake or vss wire but didn't realize that you can't use bluetooth or some settings without it hooked up. Just go ahead and get the bypass if you are looking at this model.
customer_reviews.author: B Cates

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but that's about it
customer_reviews.text: This unit has a good sound but didn't work well with my iPod touch. It had to index the library each time I started the car and it took 20 minutes to do it. Also the instructions state that only FAT 16 and FAT 32 formatted USB flash drives will work. If you have a decent sized music library, you won't be able to fit it on a non-NTFS formatted drive. This unit should have been discontinued years ago. It is worthless at any price. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike T.

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer is a good and reliable brand. Decent value for the product.
customer_reviews.text: This wasn’t easy to install, but I think that can be attributed to the car I drive being older and having to use a couple different wiring harnesses for the process, however, once it was set up I was stoked. It’s nice to look at, user friendly, and customizable. I don’t use aux anymore but I wish it had had a front port option, but other than that it all works great. I guess the other minor annoyance was the fact that utilizing my steering wheel controls with it will be next to impossible but I’m gonna look into buying the harness for it and trying to make it happen soon.
customer_reviews.author: Karli

customer_reviews.title: For what it is, it's considerably good.
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use, easy to install. Incorporated well with my steering wheel controls. It's not flawless by any stretch of the imagination. I can't listen listen to music on my thumbdrive without setting the brake enough to trigger the video safety thing. Outside of that, which I don't use all that often anyway, it's a good deck for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Dresden

customer_reviews.title: Update: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Update: it has developed an issue with its bluetooth module, apparently (error-10). Will sometimes refuse to connect and flat out refuse to play certain songs. Just outside its 1-year warranty, conveniently. Installed in a 2006 Hyundai Sonata. Pretty straightforward installation except you need to bend a little metal tongue-looking thing in the dash down before it will fit. The LED lights on the side is configurable to different colors including a setting that will scroll through all the colors.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Super nice. Very recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Fit perfect on a 2007 Toyota Yaris. Only buy a dash kit for your car.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Algarin

customer_reviews.title: The radio was easy to install and it works well
customer_reviews.text: The radio was easy to install and it works well. Sometimes it’s freezes up but restarting the car clears that up. Sometimes it doesn’t show the right song is playing on the screen. Just minor annoyances with electronics and Bluetooth tech.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hall

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded Sound Quality in a 2002 4Runner
customer_reviews.text: This headunit is great value for the money. The sound quality is fantastic and the Bluetooth audio seamless integrates into the headunit. I found switching between phone calls and and Bluetooth music easy. Note: I installed this on a 2002 4Runner. I ordered some harnesses that did not line up properly with the car’s input. I ended up taking into a car audio installation specialist. I was disappointed that I couldn’t find a wiring diagram for the headunit or the car. I plan on eventually installing a reverse camera and will update when I do so!
customer_reviews.author: astronomy today

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Looks good performs good plays videos off usb radio works flawlessly and Bluetooth works good
customer_reviews.author: Virginia shoppers

customer_reviews.title: Good product when it works.
customer_reviews.text: This review really doesn’t have anything to do with vendor. It’s Pioneer’s issue. Well, I was hoping that I wouldn’t experience the same issues as other reviewers. This head unit is awesome...EXCEPT, the Bluetooth is just terrible. Don’t get me wrong, it works most of the time, however, it has rarely connected automatically and rarely displays the data it is playing. The phone integration is great...when it works. Will be checking for a sofware update to hopefully resolve this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D.

customer_reviews.title: After installed I have little issues
customer_reviews.text: Installing is difficult at best for a first timer. But after installed properly it’s kinda perfect. Occasionally it has a glitch but easy fix turn it off then on. Bluetooth range is not that good but if the phone is in the car it’s perfect. A little latency but not to bad. Sound customizable is pretty decent but could be better the screen looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Gindi F.

customer_reviews.title: Very good price and product.
customer_reviews.text: I have installed many systems through the years. Including head units. Love this unit. Who needs DVD in the vehicle. Our son is grown and gone. Love the backup camera. "Not included". This unit is very simple to use. And Bluetooth connects every time. With a small delay. I have a Kenwood double din in another vehicle. And it is always a pain to connect. This Pioneer is great so far. Any changes to my review will be added when needed. I have added aftermarket speakers and sub. Sounds great. Love this very reasonable prices unit.
customer_reviews.author: Eightbll

customer_reviews.title: Great Product from Pioneer!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome head unit for the price, made my door speakers and even my sub sound better. Don't like the limited movie files that it accepts. Will just have to download movies in a certain format if I wanna have it in the car. The bypass works great as well for this player, much easier than having to use a switch every time, just spend the extra $10 for the bypass, it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Coggins

customer_reviews.title: Adequate Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Had some initial issues, screen went black and wouldn't turn back on, I pulled it out everything looked fine, unplugged the power and plugged it back in and it started working just fine. The bluetooth music links up but doesn't allow full controls. I use Pandora on my phone and the shuffle and repeat song on the display doesn't work, I have to open my phone to do it. However the sound quality is good and the touch screen seems to work great. For the price, if you are in a pinch (my stereo went out and I had no music for a few days) this is an adequate purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Howard

customer_reviews.title: ERROR 10
customer_reviews.text: I keep getting an "ERROR 10". So I ordered a micro bypass to fix the problem and I am still getting an "ERROR 10". I am not happy and will be returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Big Mike

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Unit!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stereo and for the price it made my 1999 Mitsubishi Montero come into the modern world. Likes: -fits perfectly -used old stereo mounts -great sound -easy to use -lots of color options -Bluetooth always connects -connects to my iphone with charging cable Dislikes: -can be hard to see in sun -doesn’t come with mounting brackets Other than that it’s a super good head unit and I would recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: annette marie rossi

customer_reviews.title: Good lucking Installing
customer_reviews.text: I’d give zero stars if I could. Looks cool and fits well but the wire installation is a nightmare. I called and had a new head unit sent because customer support said I had a bad unit. Two days later the new one gets here I plug it in only to get the same result. Double checked all wires and even hooked up the spare plug that was sent with no help. Overall huge pain the a** only to have to reinstall my stock radio.
customer_reviews.author: trent

customer_reviews.title: Worked Well with my Backup Camera
customer_reviews.text: This unit replaced a failed unit in my motorhome. This unit doesn't have a CD/DVD player, but we didn't use that much anyway, so no great loss. It works well with our iPhones for music, and the radio sounds great. The microphone works great for hands-free calls on the phone as well. Overall, I'm happy with the purchase. The only tedious thing was installing the new connector. But the wire colors are standard and make it easy. I used shrink wrap crimp fittings to make the connections.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C. Petzold

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth not so great
customer_reviews.text: I waited a month to write this review and by far the Bluetooth is the most annoying. I’ve discovered that if you are patient it will connect so maybe I’m just too used to fords sync where there is no wait time. Also if I haven’t hooked up to it for a few days it’ll do this weird thing where I control my phones music from the radio but the music plays on my phone only. I don’t think I’d buy this again..disappointing for a pioneer. I’m using an iPhone 7. Other than that is very easy to use and install. Haven’t tried dvd yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer doesn’t fail this unit does the Job
customer_reviews.text: This pioneer is a good unit for your money. It has touchscreen, USB input, rear camera back up. No fancy external services, just good old schools music inputs. Reproduces video and has aux input capability with a very loud stereo. Good for upgrading any old unit with a Beautiful and powerful unit. It does it’s job
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Love the head unit
customer_reviews.text: Love the head unit. Super lightweight. Bright screen. Easy to install. Only issue i have is when i hook my phone up to it, it gets stuck on the title of the first song i played. I can still change the song but the song title and artist do not change. No biggie tho. Still a good radio.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Ricker

customer_reviews.title: Great stereo with LOTS of features for a budget price
customer_reviews.text: The stereo was easy to install with a wiring harness kit. Looks and sounds great. I'm blown away by some of the features in this stereo that were previously only available in much more expensive models. The crossover filter provides very specific, fine tuning. The individual speaker control works great. You can't go wrong with this. The UI is easy to use, the touchscreen is responsive, and the menus are easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer makes the best head units
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my scion in about 45 minutes. I plan on installing an amp and sub and wasn't expecting a huge increase in sound quality just from the head unit into the stock speakers. Boy was i wrong! This thing was pounding. My friend got in and was wondering what subwoofer I put in. He was blown away by the fact that it was just the stock speakers
customer_reviews.author: tod

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth MasterPiece
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a good radio, easy to install and haven't had any issues out of it. Love how it displays song title, artist, and album when I stream music via Bluetooth. That's literally the only reason why I upgraded from my old jensen radio. Guess the only dislike is the radio station presets are kinda smashed to the side and hard to read what station your on. Not a big deal, I don't listen to the radio much
customer_reviews.author: Disturbed158

customer_reviews.title: Good Radio
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the new radio in my 350z. It did require OEM rails for the install which I did not have so shop had to custom-build some. radio quality is great but seeing the touch screen doing the day is tough because its dim-lit. This is my only complaint. Good otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: SMC

customer_reviews.title: could be better
customer_reviews.text: there are issues with this product unfortunately. first of all it doesn't wanna work properly with a back up camera installed and you have to manually switch to video when backing up even with it wired to the breaks. there is a spelling error that kinda made me laugh. it doesnt have the best touch screen and may take a few taps to get it to do what you want. but it was a decent price for the value just with it worked right.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: In hindsight I dont know if i would get this...
customer_reviews.text: While there is no real problem with sound quality or install, getting any video to play on here requires more work than I am willing to do. Also, the usb that you use should not be over 16GB as it will not recognize some files if you do use a larger one. Also, it seems strange to have the usb port in the back of the unit but I got an extension and replaced one of my power ports with a USB/ AUX outlet that works just fine. For the price its great but I think I would be happier with a higher resolution screen that can play mp4 video.
customer_reviews.author: RontheMACdon

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer is the way to go.
customer_reviews.text: I just finished installing this radio. I have to say, i love the look of it. Very clean and sleek. I didnt know if i wanted a cd/dvd slot or not but i took a chance and i dont regret it. I will update once i have owned it for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Jay sincere p

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, has a decent amount of features, especially for the money. The touch screen is very accurate and only takes a light touch. Bluetooth works excellent. Colors are nice, screen has an auto-dim feature that works great.
customer_reviews.author: Tori R.

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: works great, im been using it forma over a month and have no problem, i have a hyundai santa fe 2002 v6 , just that i found out that you cant delete the entries on the bluetooth but find out it was because i not connect the sensor for the break, but you can just connect it to the gound or reset the whole thinkg using the little hole on the left side a the botton.
customer_reviews.author: jose arriaga

customer_reviews.title: Bought for girlfriends car
customer_reviews.text: Fit well and most importantly it has hands free calling which my gf surely needed. The sound quality is much better than with stock head unit. Only issue is the backup cam picture is upside down. I don't know if it is the fault of the cam or the radio. With it being so cold I'll change the cam when warmer to find out.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Don't really care about it not having a DVD player, since I don't watch them while i'm driving..... lol. Great with bluetooth audio. No need to press play to start the music. Does it on the fly once it's connected to your device. Color options are ok, not too many of them but they're good. Also can turn off the screen completely and still listen to music. Love that so that no one can see the radio so they can try to steal it. Can just touch the screen to show it again.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Williams

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Touch Head unit does not play CDs
customer_reviews.text: Entry level head unit very easy to install. I'm not giving it 5 star review because I thought the fonts looked kind of cheap and I sometimes have trouble accessing my phone book for some reason. Also the AuX jack is in the back of the unit so you'd have to buy a separate audio cable and run the chord yourself. Absolutely great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S.

customer_reviews.title: it will do.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install, it didnt read the part where it said it does not play cd 's buy that on me. It did cut off and on by itself today. So idk how thats gonna work out if it does it again.
customer_reviews.author: Fleur de lis

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Just installed on my car and not happy because it has very poor AM reception. My old one had much beter reception. Also, difficult to use. To switch you first need to hit home button or click on drop down menu. Then select desired radio or Bluetooth option. It has no option to create shortcuts. Also, insufficient options for customization. I would never by this product
customer_reviews.author: GMAT_Student

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does the job I intended it for. Back up camera screen and Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Mckellim

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely terrible
customer_reviews.text: Worst head unit I have ever bought. I have owned it for about a year and it has completely quit working. After about 6 months the Bluetooth stopped working and now the USB has stopped working too. Not worth the money at all, better to just spend a little more to buy a better head unit.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Boldt

customer_reviews.title: Bought For 2000 4Runner, Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Great radio for the price. Everything works and it was easy to install. I also purchased an aftermarket harness which made the install even easier. Harness: Scosche TA02B Wire Harness to Connect An Aftermarket Stereo Receiver for Select 1984-Up Toyota Vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: It's cool.
customer_reviews.text: I don't even use anything else but the bluetooth to hook up a phone and listen to my music. The deck is super light and easy to install. You can't complain. All those knocking one star or whatever are just being little brats.
customer_reviews.author: lordwise

customer_reviews.title: Hands free talking on my phone is clear and works awesome! I am extremely pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this head unit!!! I’ve been using it in my truck for about a year now and it still works like the day I bought it. This thing cranks!! I added a subwoofer and different mids and highs in my truck and found out this unit has a built in adjustable crossover. My truck sounds so good!! My sound system SCREAMS in my truck!!! This is by far the best thing I have bought for my truck.
customer_reviews.author: David Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Awesome head unit and a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Love love this head unit! Awesome quality. I've had installed Pioneer in all my vehicles for 20 yrs and this one was awesome! Has all the settings and inputs/outputs needed for this car stereo junkie
customer_reviews.author: Matt N

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Deck is cool for the most part. Good options and great price. Randomly has some kinks but good otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Bird

customer_reviews.title: Works grwat
customer_reviews.text: Great radio for the price. Works great sounds great. Only thing that is a down side would be when using Bluetooth it will get stuck on a song title and not change. But I seen this in another review and does not bother me that much.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my 2012 Ram 1500! Car Toys wanted to charge me $900 to install a similar unit and backup camera. I did have to modify (with a dremel) my dash to make it fit, but I knew that going in. The unit comes with a wiring plug and antenna adapter, which is nice. I installed an Incark backup camera at the same time and it works great with the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Jes L

customer_reviews.title: Good for iphone.
customer_reviews.text: Works well with an iphone. Connection to my android phone is a hit and miss.
customer_reviews.author: ec

customer_reviews.title: Knockoff, fake, cheap
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy! Its a cheap knockoff.. the screen works less than 50% of the time.. color changes on its own.. cant remember saved radio stations.. backup camera almost never shows on screen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Put this in my son’s car to replace the original radio. Works really well and like the microphone that came with it for the calls.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. I can change the colors on the screen and buttons to match my car and it has hook up for reverse camera. Even made my stock speakers sound better without installing an amp
customer_reviews.author: CHENTÄZO

customer_reviews.title: Fits any 2008-2014 Subaru Impreza
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. It fit in my car great beside I did need to buy a kit to make it look legit. The only problems that I have had with it is that when I play music it shows the picture of the album that I last played. Then also once I have played it for a few hours it will get heated and not show any album cover... but overall it’s a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: A great option for the price. Touch screen can be tricky sometimes but once it was calibrated from the settings menu it seems to work better. This isn't the latest and greatest unit but if you need to upgrade your stock unit then definitely consider this option. Sound quality is great and it has a ton of options in the settings for you to customize the looks and sound of the stereo.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Beacham

customer_reviews.title: This this brought My 1970 VW in the 2000's
customer_reviews.text: The ease of how to use the screen Way Better than its comperor Alpine
customer_reviews.author: Kurt M. Seiler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: The best looking and operating, for the money you pay.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett DuBois

customer_reviews.title: Not the right size
customer_reviews.text: Item does not fit my vehicle. Even though it says it should. This will not be an easy install for 2000 f150 or expeditions.
customer_reviews.author: Dorian Braxton

customer_reviews.title: Junk, buy something better
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two for my work trucks, one stopped working within 7mo the other stopped yesterday at 14mo. Buy something better.. trash
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Westberry

customer_reviews.title: This is actually a really nice stereo for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a really nice stereo for the price. I will say it is very difficult to install and does NOT turn on/off with the ​ignition, not sure why but it is kind of annoying. Nice sound and clean look to it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Kennaugh

customer_reviews.title: 2006 Nissan Frontier
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to install and very good sound with the stock speakers. Good value for the price. No issues with the Bluetooth for streaming Pandora or making phone calls.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Screen response and other issues
customer_reviews.text: It worked good for the first few minutes then it constantly muted and unmuted and every time you touch the screen it mutes and go back and forth between that. Also if you try to turn it up or down it mutes and unmutes constantly. So I figured the screen calibration went out of wack randomly for some reason and when I try to touch the settings button it doesn’t respond to my touch only a few buttons work others are just dead.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Odato

customer_reviews.title: Priced appropriately,  very good stereo!
customer_reviews.text: Loaded with features you want in a stereo. Graphic EQ has a few nice presets, but only has 2 custom EQ slots for your edit and save. Phone mic works good and clear for hands free. Bluetooth connectivity is great as well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Adkisson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this unit. Nice colors, great touch screen, plenty of power. This thing really jams.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great in my 2006 Chrysler 300C. Easy install. Required the PAC-RP4-CH11 interface
customer_reviews.author: Purple Lady

customer_reviews.title: Steering wheel control is not built in
customer_reviews.text: I like the radio alot. My my only issue is i thought it came with the pioneer built in steering wheel decoder. It says steering wheel control but didnt specify. And none of the other units have in the description if they have steering wheel control or s remote built in or not. Other than that its a pretty decent sterio. Plays really good.
customer_reviews.author: angel

customer_reviews.title: Made stock speakers sound better than before!!?
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded this in my 2002 VW TDI Jetta and made my stock speakers sound EVEN BETTER than before!? I didn’t even touch my speakers and it made the whole sound in the car wayyyy better. To be fair I was upgrading a 17 year old stereo to a brand new one but it still shocked me how much it improved the 17 year old speakers
customer_reviews.author: Kyle McGowan

customer_reviews.title: Great Upgrade from Factory
customer_reviews.text: Being my first touchscreen upgrade it has been great. Don't miss having a CD or DVD player thanks to digital media. The only draw back is no HDMI. Had to purchase a $24 aux cable and $30 medialinx cable to get HDMI. All things considered it's a great value for the price. Will update review after some use.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Great for about 4 hours.
customer_reviews.text: Heard pop then unit went ded. Contacted seller.... Lets see how it pans out.
customer_reviews.author: awesome telecom

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Looks decent enough, priced great for what it is. Haven't installed it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Metcalf

customer_reviews.title: 5 star rated
customer_reviews.text: This stereo is all I expected and more 5 star rating highly recommend this to anyone from the time I put this stereo in my car my sound system never sounded better and the built in equalizer helps slot.
customer_reviews.author: John A.

customer_reviews.title: Great when it worked, but didn't last long enough to actually use it.
customer_reviews.text: Only worked 4 times. Has power and the fuse wasn't blown. It just stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: For the price it did not last long
customer_reviews.text: The Quality was not that great radio didn’t last long had it professionally install
customer_reviews.author: Jose Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: It gives your car a modern looks and it’s really easy to use. But it was somewhat hard to install.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Son ordered for his car. Looks great and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Ther than that. Great!
customer_reviews.text: I like it all, except it doesn't sit completely in the double din.
customer_reviews.author: Storm Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice stereo, especially for the price. Installed it along with a new backup camera on my 2005 F-250.
customer_reviews.author: Public Name (required)

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great overall product. install was straight forward and worked out well in My 05 Honda Civic SE.
customer_reviews.author: P. Oli

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for price. Many different options in menu. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: emiliano

customer_reviews.title: Espanol128
customer_reviews.text: The Pioneer Double-Din sound is excellent great choice to buy
customer_reviews.author: iPhone

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Has allot of glitches, mainly with the bluetooth system integration but it is pretty decent on everything else and really good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jsmcrawler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent device, excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: It is a quality device, it has many options and audio features, the only bad thing is that it does not have animated wallpapers like the spectrum analyzer. other Pioneer products have that, but its comprensible according the low price.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Duran

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth works well
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth works well. Input for backup camera took a little bit of work to maintain a good connection.
customer_reviews.author: christopher mccain

customer_reviews.title: Nice radio
customer_reviews.text: Pioneer is a good brand. Got this for my sons car. He just got his license so we wanted something with Bluetooth. Pretty easy to install if you are handy with cars. We have an Aux cable, USB and mic connected to the unit. Looks good with the dash kit.

customer_reviews.author: Foesterman

customer_reviews.title: ... one to write raves about products but honestly I love this stereo
customer_reviews.text: I am usually not one to write raves about products but honestly I love this stereo. It does everything I wanted it to and more. My favorite feature is that you can connect up to three blue tooth devices and switch back and forth between them with ease. You can even have two of them hooked up at the same time. One phone can be set to receive and dial calls and the other can play music. Very nice unit and well worth the price I payed.
customer_reviews.author: Davey Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, solid piece of tech
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, solid piece of tech. Lack of visual effects. Looks too boring. Love Pionner for more than 20 years but guys pleaseee!!!
customer_reviews.author: JAV

product_meta.title: Pioneer MVH-200EX Digital Multimedia Video Receiver
product_meta.description: 6. 2" WVGA Touchscreen Display - Built-In MOSFET 50W x 4 Amplifier - Built-In Bluetooth - Apple and Android compatible - 3 RCA Precuts (2V) - USB / Aux input - MP3/WMA/AAC/WAV/FLAC - Back Up Camera Ready - Color Customization This bright easy to use Digital Multimedia receiver from Pioneer will bring new excitement to your vehicle. The exquisite sound quality will keep you rocking out to your favorite music no matter where you are. With built-in Bluetooth USB and auxiliary capabilities your music is always at your fingertips. The MVH-200EX Receiver is Apple and Android compatible.
feature_bullets: 800 x 400 resolution, clear-resistive touchscreen, 24-bit true color panel, display & color customization
DOES NOT PLAY CD'S OR DVDS
Android music support automatically recognizes Android smartphone as a music storage Device with music accessible via optional USB cable
Includes wiring harness, USB extension cable, Bluetooth microphone & manual
